summary:
Inspired by a scottish steak house a friend of me was in last week, I made this little beauty! I completely rebuilded the layout of the Bannered Mare and made it look so much better!
No DLCs needed!
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][size=4][url=https://www.facebook.com/iwilliblecha][/url][/size][/u][/center][size=3][size=6][font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][b][size=5]– Generals –[/size][/b][/color][/font][/size]

If you like this mod,
PLEASE FOLLOW MY BLOG: [url=http://iwilliblecha.wordpress.com/ ]http://iwilliblecha.wordpress.com/ [/url]
AND/OR MY FACEBOOK PAGE: [url=https://www.facebook.com/iwilliblecha ]https://www.facebook.com/iwilliblecha [/url]
TO STAY IN TOUCH WITH MY WORK![/size]

So, my friend was telling me about this amazing steak house he was in last week when he was in Great Britain and after he showed me some photos, I thought this would be an amazing layout/style for the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
So I spent the last few hours working on that beauty.
I hope you like it!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

[youtube]-iwKjONgxoc[/youtube] [youtube]U7jW9v0QHZU[/youtube]
[youtube]cDdrzCf-9kw[/youtube] [youtube]MucYdF4D_5c[/youtube]


_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]– REQUIREMENTS –[/b][/size][/color][/font]

• Skyrim with latest patch

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[size=5][b][font=Arial][color=#1e84cc]– FEATURES –[/color][/font][/b][/size]

• A completely rebuilt Bannered Mare!
• Lore-friendly look (inspired by an scottish steak house)!
• A new, amazing layout! Does not cause probelms with npcs added by other mods!
• Changed lighting. Does work with RLO and ELFX!
• A guest book with entries from famous persons who have visited the Bannered Mare in the past!
• and more! Just explore it yourself!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]– General Informations – [/b][/size][/color][/font]

• Sandbox, Idel Markers, etc are moved so NPCs should work without any problem!
• All Quest items and original chairs are still inside. So every mod that adds NPCs and gives them a chair inside the vanilla Bannered Mare, should still work perfectly!
• In some cases a fire spawns in the ld kitchen area. I dont know why and I cant find I way to fix it so please just disable it.
• The mod has been cleaned with TES5Edit and does not show any bugs so far!


_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=#1e84cc][b][font=Arial][size=5]– RECOMMENDED MODS – [/size][/font][/b][/color]

• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54825/?]The Real Warmaidens[/url]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56126/?]The Bosmeric Drunken Huntsman Reborn/2.0[/url]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55783/?]Arcadia’s Cauldron[/url]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49347/?]Breezehome TNF - Elianora's Flavour[/url]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56639/?]JK's Whiterun[/url]

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]– Credits – [/b][/size][/color][/font]

• Elianore for the screenshots and testing! Thank you Eli :)
• freeseamlesstextures.com for the stone texture I used for the bear statue
• SpectraHound for testing!
• I will just go ahead and already thank Hodilton for a video^^

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[url=https://www.facebook.com/iwilliblecha]
[/url][font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]– FAQs –
[/b][/size][/color][/font]
Q: The style does not fit Skyrim.
A: Great, then dont download it!

Q: Your mod sucks!
A: So do you :D

Q: Does the mod work with "insert light overhaul here"?
A: It should

Q: Will you make a bundle with all your mods?
A: Yes!

Q: When?
A: No idea.

Q: Can I use your mod, upload your mod, etc?
A: Check the "use my work" section on my blog!!

Q: I would have an idea for a mod!
A: Great, then download CK and begin to work on it ;) I dont do requests!

Q: What ENB/Textures/etc?
A: Ask Elianora! She took the screenshots!

Q: Does this mod works with quest mods that use the Bannered Mare?
A: It should, yes.
author: Helixien
